Key Match Events: Muzarabani was given a second chance but missed the ball during the final delivery
Taskin Ahmed took 3-19 in a blistering spell
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan's run out of Williams sealed the deal for Bangladesh
Bangladesh's win keeps their semi-final hopes alive
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nurul Hasan was found to have taken the ball ahead of the stumps, leading to a no-ball call
Richard Ngarava hit a four and a six from the third and fourth deliveries to leave just five required
